website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious all-in-one set that offers extra bedside storage pockets ideal for cellphones, books, or remotes.
pros: Available in a range of colors to match any decor
Set includes comforter, fitted sheet, flat sheet, bed skirt, and pillow shams
Sheets have side pockets for extra storage
Safe for machine wash. Material doesn’t pill
cons: Some complaints of the fitted sheet being too loose

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after first wash
customer_reviews.text: My first impression of this 8 piece bedding set that it was a great buy and couldn’t wait to put it on my bed. I received the package today and wanted to wash it before putting on my bed. As I was taking it out the washer I saw several tears. I really thought this was a steal for the price but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Imani Worthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter!! Super cute & looks great! Shipping took longer than expected but it was worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved it! Very soft looks & feels nice💜only had ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it! Very soft looks & feels nice💜only had 1 issue hope they will fix quickly large tear in the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Bmarlow

customer_reviews.title: poor quality and melts in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: poor quality and melts in the dryer. I returned it for a full refund, so if you do buy it, do not put in dryer or on very low setting if so.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed set. It’s super soft and comfy. The design is super fancy and classy. My husband loved it and wasn’t too girlie. It did have a lot of loose threads on it but it didn’t affect the product. It’s super lightweight but still very warm. It came with much more than I expected; bedskirt, pillow shams, pillowcases but pockets in the fitted sheet! That’s what won my man over for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my king size bed.I love this set! and who knew there are pockets on the sides for your phone or crossword book or remotIt will never get lost in the covers again.! They are so very soft and beautiful.Just love this set.Shams are nice,bedskirt,comforter exceptional.Love it
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The sheets are a little thin but it looks pretty and that’s all that matters, right? Lol
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!  Soft and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a queen adjustable bed, and decided to go with the king set, so it would be more room for the bed being adjusted at times. It is a bit too big but I do not have anymore issues with my husband stealing all the covers! :) It's very pretty. I love it! It's nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: S Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go in my college dorm room and it is just beautiful and incredibly comfortable. It's a great bargain for all the pieces you get and something I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sewn Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Ok first off one of my pillowcases was made wrong. To get the diamond affect, they gather the fabric & sew it together. That gathered fabric should be hidden on the inside of the pillowcase & blanket. If you watch my video you’ll see one of the pillowcases made correctly, & the other made wrong. You can’t just turn it inside out because the seams from around the pillow case would show. Because I know how to sew, I just took it apart & fixed it myself. With that being said for me personally I still thought $70 for an entire Cal King set is a great deal. It also fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The detail work cannot be really seen because the color is so dark. The color in the photo is more medium gray. I did not even take it out the bag. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, but poor quality and very cheaply made. The first time the bedding arrived to my home I found small holes on the bedspread and on the sheets. I asked seller for a new set which they gladly accommodated. I washed the new set after 1 week of use. After taking it out of the dryer there are holes and rips throughout the comforter. It's comfy, but very cheaply made of poor quality material. A comforter and sheet set should not rip and tear after a wash. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The bed set is super comfy, but does not hold up to a single wash. Not durable, which is unfortunate as it looks like a nice set. The sheet corner gave way during the first wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: ChristiAnn Baehr

customer_reviews.title: This was by far the worst thing I have purchased on Amazon and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. This was by far the worst thing I have purchased on Amazon and it has made me FOREVER skeptical of the reviews I read on here. I washed this set (ACCORDING TO DIRECTION) and the blanket had a HUGE hole in it after. Save your money, trust me. You get what you pay for, go and buy something of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly of burnt plastic
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the microfiber smells very strongly of burnt plastic. Who knows what poisonous chemicals they put in it?
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Looks gorgeous but...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now had this gorgeous bedding outfit on my bed for a couple weeks now so here is my review. I’ll update it if anything changes. It is beautiful! However, it smells musky almost like sweat and this was before we even used it. That was a little concerning but nothing a good wash can’t fix I suppose. It is also VERY lightweight. Keep that in mind. My former bedding outfit looked identical but was much heavier than this one, so it was an adjustment. Also, the sheets have pockets. We don’t use them because we charge our phones at night and don’t feel comfortable putting them in cloth sheets in case of overheating. Overall, gorgeous bedding though!
customer_reviews.author: Steerfork

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this but when it came in I only go half of my order, I didn’t get the sheet or fitted sheet or pillow shams, the comforter had a hole in it.. it was really soft don’t get me wrong but I just wished I had my full order, also there were a few loose threads which would have ruined the comforter eventually had I cut or pulled on it.
customer_reviews.author: missperez1988

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a king set of this item while unpacking this item my wife cut her hand on a rusty blade that came inside it looked like factory scissors attached to it was a piece of fabric almost like someone wore it around their neck or waist. We threw out the sheets. Who knows what was on the end of that rusty blade. She has a permanent scar now on her hand. Worst purchase on amazon ever. I have stopped purchasing items like this off amazon. Who knows where they actually come from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bedding and comforter are great! However
customer_reviews.text: The bedding and comforter are great! However, it did not come with the full set as it was missing the pillow case. I have reached out but still have not received one!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Take a chance
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised - super soft and smooth against the skin, light weight but still warm. The teal is bright and beautiful, exactly as pictured which is always a plus when shopping online. First night using them so can't speak for the longevity but so far extremely pleased with this purchase. I'd like to see an option where you can trade out the bed skirt for 2 more pillow cases. I'd definitely want it in more colors Update: The last 2 pics are what I found after sleeping on the sheets one night. Balls of lint everywhere! While the sheets are still nice and soft I'm not sure of their durability. Hopefully a few washes will take away the lint
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this comforter set since April 3rd or 4th, not even a whole 2 months. It was comfortable, and then the punches in the comforter started braking. It also ripped the fabric where one came out. The sheets also developed pinholes that ripped so now the sheet looks like it’s been shredded. Literally the only thing I do with the comforter is sleep underneath it. We remove it from the bed for any kind of activity. We don’t even sit on top of it. If you are only getting for looks and don’t plan on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny I paid for it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this 8-piece bed in a bag I love it so much I want to buy another one from myself I got this for my daughter as a wedding gift it is absolutely beautiful and not only that the fitted sheets have two pockets on either side for your glasses of book cigarettes that's whatever your medicine and it holds this stuff on each side of the bed and I pocket up by where your pillow would be absolutely genius idea. I got the color gray and it's stunning for$66 you are getting quite a bit for your money.
customer_reviews.author: MURIEL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the set
customer_reviews.text: Got mine yesterday. Absolutely love the set. I’ve had trouble finding a king comforter that fit well, but this one fit great and looks amazing. The comforter and sheets were so soft and the comforter wasn’t too thin or too thick. I haven’t used the pocket yet but thought that was a cool feature. I felt like royalty sleeping last night. I would highly recommend. I’m going to get one for my sons room too.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Love this set fits perfectly I didn't even know the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this set fits perfectly I didn't even know the sheets had little pockets on the side which is pretty convenient since I always lose stuff in the bed. Had an issue with the with the navy set not being in after I ordered but the sellers reached out to me offered to refund or pick another color and I chose a different color for the same price as the navy set
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.text: This set is super soft and comfortable. The level of comfort is actually unbelievable. I’m IN LOVE with comforters and Blankets— especially soft ones! I would definitely recommend this. I would say however, it does get hot fast. It is considered a lightweight blanket, but somehow it can be very hot very fast. I sleep in a 60° room, and just using this blanket is still as hot. So I would say this is a good winter blanket or maybe you like it hot. But I definitely can’t complain because the comfort is definitely incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Starke

customer_reviews.title: Quality not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The price for this set is amazing . however the quality is not great. The quilted design doesn’t allow the comforter to spread evenly nor attractively. Upon opening and placing the comforter on our bed I noticed it was discolored in some sections. The color is uneven and it doesn’t spread out smooth as pictured. It looks like it was balled up for a long period. It’s very thin. It looks thicker online. I personally wouldn’t recommend to purchase. I am disappointed because I need a comforter set that attractive and comfortable :(
customer_reviews.author: tasheena

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews said, this isn’t nearly as fluffy or high quality as it looks. The sheets are cheap, so I’ll be donating them. The spread is fine for the guest room but I’d be even more disappointed if I bought it for my master. It wasn’t as inexpensive as it should have been for the quality. If you have your heart set on what’s in the picture, choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: kld311

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy Filling pokes through!
customer_reviews.text: Looked really nice, just like the picture...for a few days. We didnt even have it a week yet before it started feeling really itchy and scratchy. After just the first wash (as per the directions) it looked like it was covered in short white dog hair or something. The filling was poking through the fabric. This is what was so prickly, but now you could SEE it. Super cheaply made with cheap materials. The sheets and pillow covers were ok but comforter was horrible. Was able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to receive this set for my bedroom in college. However after a few days, I noticed a tear in the lining of the blanket. I just sleep on top of it because I don’t cover myself with it, so I hadn’t made any hard movements to tear it. Very sad about that considering it’s new but this already came apparent that it wasn’t made of good, durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this set is really nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So, this set is really nice and comfortable. However the ruffles seem to come unstitched very easily. I am almost afraid to wash it! The pockets on the sheets are also starting to rip. It’s really disappointing that this is happening any I have had it only for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Carr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but the comforter tears easily
customer_reviews.text: This package was a great deal overall for the price, however the comforter, while beautiful, is of such thin, fragile material, that it took less than a week of my 3 year olds climbing up onto our bed before several tears have developed. It won’t be long before it needs to be replaced, though, in fairness, we are still quite happy with the sheets, pillow cases, and shams, which are of slightly higher quality. This would be a fantastic set if the comforter was of better quality, but at this price I suppose corners needed to be cut somewhere...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: if you’re on the edge of buying this or not BUY IT!!! it came in a pretty rough looking box and I opened it and I was so happy to say it came undamaged and it perfect condition and looks EXACTLY like the pictures! It’s so pretty I’m in love
customer_reviews.author: Angie M

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: First it was really nice but after the first night the pin ticks started coming undone and the cotton inside the blanket has bunched so bad that it looks and feels lumpy. The sheets are nice but the comforter is junk. After about 5 nights I was ready for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bachman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!! Functional and beautiful for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter set. I actually did not want to have the navy blue comforter and navy blue Sheets together because I felt like it was a lot. But fortunately my daughter also needed sheets so I gave her the navy blue sheets and I put dark gray sheets with mine. I love the way it looks. I think it’s a great value and it fits our bed wonderfully, it’s also really soft and plush. My daughter loves the fact that there’s a little pocket for her to put stuff in on the side of the sheets. That is so creative and a wonderful idea!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set. It's hard to find a king set that's not an astronomical price. After washing there was some pilling but nothing crazy. It's a very soft set and super comfortable. I thought the polyester was going to be a problem but they breathe very well. However, I wish the comforter was a bigger. Since I have a California King it's a little small but the bed skirt helps cover up what the comforter can't.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits well and looks great. My only complaint is the stitching on the comforter is horrible. Done very cheaply and already came unraveled. Update: After having it on for about a month more of the stitching on the comforter came unraveled. Starting to get pissed looking at it and realizing what a waste of money it was. $65 for a one time use is bogus. I don't recommend Save your money and buy a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: OMG-what kind of fresh heaven is this?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the type of person to review quote-unquote "luxury items that are actually cheap, bc honestly, they're usually only good BC if cost. Bbut I have to say, that as a person who's purchased expensive, high thread-count bedding exclusively my whole life-this is by far the most comfortable bedding I've ever purchased!! [and my fiance definitely agrees]. We've been saying we feel like we are sleeping on a cloud LOL and this was cheap bedding we bought in a pinch because most of ours was filthy and we didn't want to bother with laundry!! Try this. Youll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: thin "whispy" material
customer_reviews.text: The material is so thin it's actually difficult to put the pillow case on a pillow! And it's so shear any color on the pillowcase (like blue lines or gold/yellow cord) shows through. I've had to buy a whole set of white pillow cases to put underneath them to be able to use them. And it turns out the pinched/crunched design just makes the bed look messy even when it's made, because the material is so whispy it wrinkles! I'm rating this 3 stars though because the price is really low and I like the dust ruffle. Will spend the money and buy something more robust next time.
customer_reviews.author: superflashgo

customer_reviews.title: Quality , so soft , beautiful , 8 piece set !
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much that I now have the red as well as the black comforter set . The sheets are sooo soft. The comforter design pretty. Warm but not too hot as my serpa ones. Just remember to follow directions. Don’t use hot water or hot heat on the set. Use cool water and air dry in dryer or line dry . Don’t pull on the comforter by the designs of you may lossen the thread. The whole 8 piece set is perfect. Great red color not bright or orange red . Quality product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Bed in a bag.
customer_reviews.text: The color scheme of this bed in a bag matches perfectly with our room. The comforter can get lost and caught up in our feet. The pillow cases are extremely big and not made for normal size pillows. The fitted sheets do not stay on a king size bed. The corners pop off every single night. I am having to purchase separate sheets just so we can resolve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Eason

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price! Looks like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great buy overall. I was a little skeptical at first reading all the reviews on other comforter bed sets that people have purchased on Amazon, but this bed set looks exactly like the picture. It’s soft, good quality, affordable, and looks expensive. We purchased the California king set and it actually fit the whole mattress! We have purchased California King bed sets and it didn’t quite fit the mattress and was too small. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GodivaChan

customer_reviews.title: Holes in seams
customer_reviews.text: Updating review: I've had this comforter since the beginning of July and it is now the beginning of September. It's already developed 3 large holes along 3 seams. I could do a crappy job of stitching it myself but after less than 3 months AND not having even washed it, I'm pretty annoyed about it. I really liked the softness of the sheets it comes with and the shams are cute but the comforter itself is cheaper quality than I was expecting. I personally wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gonderman

customer_reviews.title: Exact material we wanted but wish it wasn't defective
customer_reviews.text: received this yesterday. Extremely soft and exactly what we wanted. However there were random stitches all over the comforter. since this is reversible even if I could deal with it on the side with the pleats the other side was very noticeable it looked absolutely horrible. I immediately requested a replacement order and shipped it back so hopefully it will not have the stitching on it tomorrow. We ordered a king and it looks like it was a California king but that was not the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Miano

customer_reviews.title: Goes in the damaged unclaimed freight pile
customer_reviews.text: The comforter was damaged and appeared to be scorched with an iron or other heat element. There was a hole and snags in various places. If it wasn't damage I would give it . the description says cal/king however the only thing that fits the california king is the comforter and pillow cases
customer_reviews.author: Kazz Mack

customer_reviews.title: Comforter came with yellow and brown stains & small hairs on it
customer_reviews.text: My order just arrived in the mail once I opened the bag I saw a yellow and brown stains on the corner of the comforter. Right away I’m thinking it could have been rat or mice pee. 🤮🤮🤮 I looked closer and see hair or “fur” on it. I’m so disgusted, I put it all back in the bag right away and thoroughly sanitized my hands and everything else it touched.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfALotOfCrazyKids

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed set!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable bed sheets and comforter I've ever own...they are incredible soft. I love them!, The side pocket in the fitted sheet is super cool. Today I went ahead and ordered 6 more sheets ( I really just wanted 2, but only 1 sheet or 6 offered, so I opted for the 6) so I now I will always have clean sheets readily available if guests show up unexpectedly. I would definitely purchase this set again and I highly recommend them.. These are the king size..the set is extremely affordable and in my opinion, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: The search is over!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god I love this set. I bought a king size for my oversized queen bed and it’s perfect. Definitely wash before use. I wash everything before I wear/use it. The king size fits perfect and the sheets are extremely soft! I just wish I could have gotten standard size pillowcases instead of the king size ones, but I will make it work! The comforter itself is so incredibly soft, as is the filling inside. It’s not heavy or hot and is everything I hoped it would be (:
customer_reviews.author: Corrie M Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetic but Not Practical.
customer_reviews.text: This products material attracts the smallest particles and pieces of dust. It accumulates and creates the need to vacuum your bed or wash your sheet more often. The cover when washed rips and the internal material accumulates on the outside. The aesthetic look is fantastic but practical use is not worth it at the given price.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler W.

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I almost let other reviews stop me from purchasing. I love my bedding. It's beautiful, I don't plan on washing these though, I would much rather dry clean them. The sheet's are very comfortable and having the pocket there is so helpful when charging your phone and storing the remote control. I definitely recommend this for men ( my husband use to always misplace the remote)
customer_reviews.author: A. Starling

customer_reviews.title: Better than the like-a-likes!!!  Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: We took a chance and bought this for our daughter’s first dorm room. We had seen similar ones at stores such as Target and Walmart... but none had the size we needed. It was beautiful right out of the package. Her room mate actually bought one that looked exactly like it from a store. Although they looked alike.... there was no comparison. This one looked much better made... and lots more expensive. The material looked thicker and more durable than her roommates. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Polkmom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this comforter since January of 2019. I still absolutely love it! I am looking for something new just to change up my bedroom and even considered just getting a different color.!! There is a pocket on the sheet and that has torn but besides that the condition is great! I would highly recommend this comforter set. I will also say that the pillow cases are slightly larger than your normal pillowcase size. Definitely could be because I have a king mattress with normal size pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter set so much that I had to leave a review and I never leave reviews! It so soft, fluffy and comfortbable its hard for me to get out of bed in the morning. I love this set so much that when I accidently left my comforter in the washer machine for a week after going out of town and coming back to it being moldy, I ordered the same exact same one again. I highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Gray

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous for the price! The true color of the Aqua Blue is exactly what you would expect -- not the "mint" color as it appears on the site image. It's perfect for my guest room! It's also surprisingly puffy -- much more volume that I would have thought, which is great!! I washed the sheets before putting them on the bed and they are soooo soft! Buy this -- you will not regret it! Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of everything. I do wish that the plastic zipper holder wasn't busted because I do rotate my comfurtors and I like using the holder to keep it sealed and clean for the next use. Can't wait to sleep in my bed tonight. ****update I love the comfurtor looks good and feels good doesn't get hot. I love the pocket so much but the sheets don't allow bits of dirt thru it so if a tiny bit of anything get on the sheets you feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Best Comforter Set Ever & Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this comforter set. It’s so comfortable and feels so soft against my skin. It’s not “you get what you paid for” It was very reasonably priced and we absolutely love it. I’m gonna order more colors. The pockets on the sheets are great for holding my phone and remote. This is a must have set. It makes my room feel like and look like a 5 star hotel!.
customer_reviews.author: iluv2teach

customer_reviews.title: 5-star for price, quality and presentation!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value for a quality product! I am a high end linen shopper and purchased this set for an air mattress/extra bedding set for guests. When it arrived, I was blown away with the quality for the price! It was in excellent condition, arrived on time and exceeded my expectations! My kids said. “Mom, this is too nice for an air mattress!” It’s a wonderful set for your home, rather a guest room or your primary bedroom. I was impressed and I’m a “linen snob.” 5-Star, for money and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Great bedding set...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the design. I love that it came as an entire bedding package. That's hard to find these days. The comforter gets really warm and the sheets are nice and soft. It has that luxury feel when you're laying in bed. The fabric seems to be very durable. Please follow the care tag or you will run this set! I highly recommend this bedding set of your looking for a unique style.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Was nice until I washed it.
customer_reviews.text: This bedset came in and I was very much looking forward to using it. However, after 5 min on a low cycle on delicate in the dryer- the bedskirt completely melted and melted all over the sheets and my dryer. One star- this should come with a warning regarding the bedskirt and maybe a handwash or something. I've never had this issue with any bedskirt ever. I'm not too happy about this purchase, and super sad about my now unusable bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Soft! And pretty! (Teal) (king sz)
customer_reviews.text: Because of the cost, I had low expectations. But very surprised! I am so comfortable. The sheets are so soft. The packaging was nice. It's a lovely set! Cant wait to get more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ciana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed set! We bought the king set and every thing fits perfectly! The pockets in the fitted sheet set is AWESOME! We put the tv remote or our phones in them at night. They are surprisingly good sized pockets! The sheets and comforter are super soft! The pillow cases are large enough that you can put bigger pillows or average sized pillows into them. I am very very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shonteka

customer_reviews.title: NEED
customer_reviews.text: wanted to change up my bed aesthetic from pink/ purple stripes to solid black and I'm v satisfied. blanket is very lightweight and a plus about the bed sheets is there are pockets to maybe hold your phones/ tablets instead of cluttering the bed stand. for this price, it comes with everything (and more) than your bed would need. overall happy w my purchase and hoping it can last a long time since its so lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping it would last at least one wash.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. It was beautiful and soft. It then I washed it, it tore apart on the under side and the top has strings pulled loose. I checked to see if it was me BRAND NEW low flow wash, it did not hook on anything. Cheaply made and I’d like either a refund or a new comforter. The sheets look and feel amazing still.
customer_reviews.author: Christalyn Davis`

customer_reviews.title: Very soft sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Best sheets ever! In the past I have paid a-lot of money for “soft” sheets, but these are the best I have found! The whole set is light weight and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: All blue!! Love it. Great quality! Adding this after a few days using the set. still LOVE it. It's so plush and soft and comfy. We just bought another set in a different color !
customer_reviews.author: D.L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but be gentle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed set. It's pretty, soft, breathable and easy to clean. The only downside is the stitching that makes it pretty and bunched up pulls out rather easily. So don't toss and turn like crazy or be like my dumb self and position your bed in a way that requires you to be on top of it while making it because you'll tear them right out.
customer_reviews.author: H Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this bedding set for over a year. The only issue is that the pockets on the fitted sheet have torn loose..other than that, the puckering has stood up to many many many wash and dry cycles, kids, us and animals. Still looks great. A lightweight, soft, yet warm bedding set. We use it year round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SET!!
customer_reviews.text: I picked gray, but the color scheme looks greenish/gray (if that makes sense). The color is not even an issue, actually there are no issues. This set is beyond perfect. especially for the price, I would buy this again if I had another bed to sleep in. Buy this set, you will not be disappointed. maybe a little late to work the next day, but who cares when you're sleeping on a FREAKIN CLOUD!!!!! now I miss my bed....
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I like the pockets included in the bedsheets and the price ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the pockets included in the bedsheets and the price but the quality isn't good. I haven't even had the set a year and the blanket is already torn and worn out. Yes, I did wash it in the washer but I had a comforter for more than ten years that I had bought from Bed Bath and Beyond that never tore when I washed it, and this one is torn from one wash. It sucks that I have to buy a new comforter after less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Ritu Anand

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived yesterday. As you can see the packaging was in shambles. It came in a box so I see no reason for the bag to be completely destroyed. It’s also dirty! How does that work? When I go to Walmart and buy a set it’s never dirty when I take it out of the bag. I would not advise anyone to purchase this set ever!! It’s clearly very cheaply made and going to fall apart easily. The material inside of the comforter feels lumpy. Some of the threads on it are frayed. I should have heeded the scary reviews from other purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hintze

customer_reviews.title: Quality comforter
customer_reviews.text: I received the comforter and pillow cases, but the sheets were missing. What I did receive was quality for the price, except of the difference in color between the pillow cases and the comforter... just missing the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set but didn’t wash well kinda Spendy for something that doesn’t wash well I got a Cali king set and after first wash the fit was off strings started coming off and idk if it’s the detergent I’m using but spots didn’t come out I have a 6 month old and he drools and spits up and the spots are still there I’m bummed single mom of 5 kids and I really thought I was getting something worth getting for myself
customer_reviews.author: Gina Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, but not great quality. I would purchase it again☹️
customer_reviews.text: The bedding is beautiful comfortable. The problem is that almost 90% of the pinch pleats have come undone. It's disappointing that the quality of stitching is subpar. I was hoping to have this set for a long time, but after only a few weeks and losing half of the pinch pleats already, I will probably have to replace it sooner then later. I wouldn't buy this set again
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McBrady

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase of same bedding, no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: The bad: material is on the thin side so either dry clean comforter or use a extra large washer. The good: super soft, comfy and breathable. The feel and look are exquisite. I use a mattress pad and bought my mattress to comfort fit for my needs, so put altogether I never wanna leave, lol. I got in on sale, too, so for about 50 bucks I scored all 8 pieces. So worth it, would buy again in other colors if I had other beds, lol.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but doesn’t fit a full size bed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday. The color is spot on and it is very pretty. However, to say it fits a full size bed is incorrect. The sheets are way too big so we had to purchase new ones that are made for a full size bed. The comforter is also too big for a full size bed. I think it would look much better on a queen size bed. Seems to be good quality. We have washed it a few times and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good for only a couple months
customer_reviews.text: We really loved this comforter at first! We had it for 4 months before every corner of the comforter started to lose the stuffing. The stuffing creeps into the middle of the comforter until it’s one big ball. Despite fluffing every day it got to the point after 6 months it wouldn’t fluff anymore. Had to order a new comforter. Very disappointed but should have known for the low price!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but material isn’t consistent
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and style of this comforter set and the sheets are SO soft. I only gave it 4 stars because one of the pillow cases is a completely different material from the rest of the sheets. It’s like a scratchy polyester. I gave that one to my husband...😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The fitted sheet will not stay on the mattress. The elastic band does not have enough tension to keep the sheet fitted to my mattress, which is crazy because the mattress is 16 inches deep. The fitted sheet is too big. It moves every time I do. The other sheets are nice but I ordered these partly because of the pockets and I am going to have to order a different fitted sheet. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for 29 days. It's been washed twice. The first time I noticed a small hole after washing, but it was hardly noticeable. The second time it was washed it melted. I washed it on a medium setting and dried it on low heat and it still melted. The outer fabric is fine, but the stuffing is a clump of melted fibers and it is no longer usable. DO NOT BUY IT! It is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice white bedding set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It is so soft and cozy with lots of texture. Anxious to see how it comes out of the wash when I need to launder it though. The quality seems good so far .
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I chosen this product, it was perfect for my room! The sheets feel so soft and comfortable . Pros: Fast shipping Nice package Very soft Looks fancy Picture as advertised Price is reasonable Luxury set Cons: N/a
customer_reviews.author: Tocara’s Palace

customer_reviews.title: Okay until washed
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to tell from the image, but this comforter lasted one wash... the filling material clumped up together to form a hard lump in areas. You cannot fluff or pull it apart. Very dissapointed in the durability :( The bed skirt is also not great quality, it doesn’t reach the floor and is constantly slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are amazing they are extremely soft, breathable, and made with great quality. They do have pockets on the sides for whatever you want to put in them . My wife keeps her book in her pocket. The comforter is very nice, plush, cozy, breathable, light but still pretty thick.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Garland

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because this set isn’t bad.... but it also isn’t good. If I had to do it again I’d just pick up a set at Big Lots. This set seems kind of cheap & the wrinkles set in them by the packaging are difficult to remove. I’ll keep it, but I wouldn’t buy another set or recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: West7503

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality very soft & comfortable however you can’t be rough with it or you’ll break the seems it’s more on the thin side which I like because I hate sweating. I did have to sleep with one leg out of the blanket my husband said he slept very comfortable wasn’t hot or cold which is great & it’s hard to find a comfortable that we both like because he’s cold & I’m hot! All around good product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you get all the bedding pieces you need with this set making it a good purchase. The material is soft, light weight, and super comfortable for naps and night time. I'm not usually a fan of the color brown but it matches the other bedroom decor so well. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DelMastro

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This set is definitely soft, but not as soft as the other blankets I have. The comforter and pillow shams all came in full/queen sizes. The sheets were all queen sizes however. Which is okay, but the bed skirt was way too large so I had to fold and tuck it in under my mattress. It's light and airey which is great. It's a lot darker than I expected. Definitely needs light on light to get it like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with this set. I love the side pockets in the fitted sheet. I leave my headphones and remotes in them and you can’t even tell they’re there until you reach to grab them. Everything is very soft and keeps me warm without making me sweaty at night. The set was very fairly priced and I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Schmucker

customer_reviews.title: These are so incredibly soft
customer_reviews.text: My best friend spent the night in my bed and said how comfortable my bed is my sister spent the night in my bed and said how comfortable my bed was. My mattress is 25 years old and it was the sheets that made my bed so comfortable in the comforter these sheets are like sleeping on a cloud they have made such a difference I love these sheets and have bought them repeatedly love them you will be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: City juice

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not soft or comfortable, it is very bulky. All of the stitches tear easily. The comforter CANNOT BE PUT IN THE DRIER. Doing this messes up the entire comforter. Additionally, I just learned that white sheets and comforters are a terrible idea because everything shows up on them.
customer_reviews.author: Bank1one Titanium

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love it . Gotta remember to put it the fitted sheets on correctly because the pockets on the sheets . I love the sheets because I never lose my remote now . Do not wash this in the washer machine because it can ruin it . It’s soft , doesn’t fade easily and it’s comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Blue

customer_reviews.title: Sheets a lil too thin
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the style, and comfort but the sheets are thin. One of the pillow cases tore open st the seam after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Soft bedding.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it did NOT include a bedskirt, but instead 2 fitted sheets. Other than that nothing bad to say. The exact same kind of set at Walmart is $64 for only 4 pieces. This actually went to my son, and he loves the softness, but it still passes as guy bedding (17 yrs old, thinks he needs to impress the ladies lol).
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Elizabeth Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter set! So soft and a bit bigger than a regular king which I absolutely love! (I ordered the king/cali king) With the sheet set and shams included you simply cannot beat the price! I was impressed with the quality and fluffiness of the comforter. Can't wait to sleep with this set tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sondag

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today! Opened it all up and then through it all in the wash! First off I LOVE IT!!! It’s SUPER SOFT & beautiful!! I love all 4 of the pillow covers & the sheets are super soft!!! The bed skirt is super nice and I cannot believe the price!! So far I’m super impressed!!!!!! Update! I'M IN LOVE very soft and cozy I do not want to leave my bed in the morning!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Read for 14" matress.
customer_reviews.text: It is beautifull, matrial looks ok, but as some pointed out the sheets don't look like will stand the test of time. The comforter is so nice, with the besskirt and shams, that even without the sheets is a good price, so when I bought it, the sheets where an add on. The pockets are so clever! I wish others conpanies follow. Just be aware that the comforter for a 14" matres to cover at the feet of the bed it will leave a 2 3 inches gap on the head of the bed. Is not a big deal, unless you are an OCD kind of nut head like me. Sheets fit perfectly a memory foam 14" matress.
customer_reviews.author: Juan E.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and a good value
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews I made sure to wash this entire set as soon as it arrived, and it held up just fine. If you look closely at the stitching you can tell that it's not the greatest, and I did clip a few stray threads--but you get what you pay for. It looks very nice, it's wonderfully soft and lightweight, and I do feel like I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Soft but too Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: The order was as promised, arrived on time, and is a nice quality; however, the comforter only works in cold weather. It doesn't warm in the cold and cool in the heat. That's a bit disappointing. Also, this was my mistake, but next time I would not purchase a black comforter - it shows everything.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: So soft, so comfy, so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Soooo soft and beautiful color! Worth it! Only downside maybe is I have a full bed and they only have "queen/full" as one size so the fitted sheet is a little loose but I like that I can upgrade my bed to a queen and keep the same set. So win and lose but pretty much a full win! Also I need a cool space to sleep and this set kept me warm but still cool. It's the perfect middle!
customer_reviews.author: danial zaker

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed set!! Came with everything we needed and it is so SOFT and comfortable! The sheets are great, I was a little worried because we had amazing sheets before that cost us $800 and to be honest I like the feel of these more! The blanket is so comfort and not stiff like most comforters before you break them in. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in black and I'm very pleased. It's very soft and cozy. The black looks elegant. Love the pleating detail. Fit my king perfectly. The comforter is just right for my needs; not very thick but certainly not thin to where I'm not warm. Price is right!
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

product_meta.title: Elegant Comfort Luxury Best, Softest, Coziest 8-Piece Bed-in-a-Bag Comforter Set on Amazon Silky Soft Complete Set Includes Bed Sheet Set with Double Sided Storage Pockets, King/Cal King, Gray
product_meta.description: Size:King/California King| Color:GrayExperience a fabulous night's rest with our Elegant Comfort® Hi-Loft Luxury 8-Piece Bed-in-a-bag comforter set! Bed-in-Bag Comforter set includes Bed Sheet Set with Double Sided Storage Pockets on the Fitted Sheet! You can put your glasses, remote controls, cell phones, IPADs, medicines, reading books, pens, or napkins if you ever get sniffles. Pintuck design with double-needle sewn thru construction eliminates shifting for evenly distributed warmth. Filled with 100% Hypoallergenic fiber for superior loft and all year-round comfort. All-season Bed in a Bag comforter set is cozier, softer and loftier! Ultra-soft, microfiber down-alternative shell and filling provides cozy yet breathable warmth and it's machine-washable! Luxury Pintuck design with Double-Needle stitching prevents the filling from shifting and bunching. Unlike other down-alternative comforters and blankets, better than down pampers you with the softness, loft, warmth and breathability of down in hypoallergenic, easy-care microfiber.
feature_bullets: King/California King Size Luxury 8-Piece Set Dimensions: (1) Comforter: 102" X 86" -- (1) Bed Skirt: 78" X 80" - (2) Pillow Shams: 20"X 36" - (1) Flat Sheet: 102" X 105 -- (1) Fitted Sheet: 78" X 80" - (2) Pillowcases: 20"X 40" - Fits for both King Size and California King Size Beds

INCLUDES BED SHEETS WITH SIDE POCKETS: Premium quality Bed-in-a-Bag comforter set with double sided storage pockets on fitted sheet that will allow you to keep your personal belongings right next to you! You can put your glasses, remote controls, cell phones, IPADs, medicines, reading books, pens, or napkins if you ever get sniffles -They're safely tucked into these storage pockets on the side of your bed.Bed Sheets are Deep-pocket up to 16inch, fully elasticized fitted sheet

LUXURY MEETS PERFORMANCE: Elegant Comfort provides superior performance and luxurious feel begin with yarns that are even finer, longer, and stronger than silk. These microfiber yarns are finished with a meticulous brushing and conditioning process before being woven into premium fabrics, then undergo an additional brushing to attain the lustrous, ultra-soft finish sought by connoisseurs of fine linens

HEALTHY ENVIRONMENT: Elegant Comfort yarns and ventilated weave make it hypoallergenic and antimicrobial, Unlike cotton that can harbor allergens, mildew, and even bed bugs, microfiber repels contaminants and mites, preventing them from finding a home in your bedding. Allergy sufferers breathe easy and wake up feeling refreshed instead of congested, and those with sensitive skin or conditions like eczema rest in a healing environment instead of being further irritated at night

VIBRANT, FADE-RESISTANT COLORS: Elegant Comfort microfiber is made to look as good as it feels. It's exceptionally color-fast, and even after years of regular use will look as vibrant as the first night you enjoyed it. Its ultrafine yarns and micro ventilated weave repel sweat and stains, making a short cold-water wash and a quick tumble dry on low heat all you need to keep these linens fresh and clean. They won't be weaken or tear even after years of use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,170 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
